samples.name: Default Functionalities
samples.description: This demo for Essential<sup>®</sup> JS2 Circular Gauge control illustrates the default rendering of circular gauge.

samples.name: Ticks and Labels
samples.description: This demo for Essential<sup>®</sup> JS2 Circular Gauge control shows various properties available to customize the ticks and labels of an axis.

samples.name: Multiple Axes
samples.description: This demo for Essential<sup>®</sup> JS2 Circular Gauge control visualizes the circular gauge with multiple axes.

samples.name: Custom Labels
samples.description: This demo for Essential<sup>®</sup> JS2 Circular Gauge control illustrates the custom labels in the circular gauge.

samples.name: Range Color for Axis
samples.description: This demo for Essential<sup>®</sup> JS2 Circular Gauge control demonstrate the range color for axis in the circular gauge..

samples.name: Axis Background
samples.description: This demo for Essential<sup>®</sup> JS2 Circular Gauge control demonstrate the axis background in the circular gauge..

samples.name: Pointer Types
samples.description: This demo for Essential<sup>®</sup> JS2 Circular Gauge control the different types of pointers available in the circular gauge.

samples.name: Text Pointer
samples.description: This demo for Essential<sup>®</sup> JS2 Circular Gauge control visualizes the text pointer in the circular gauge.

samples.name: Image Pointer
samples.description: This demo for Essential<sup>®</sup> JS2 Circular Gauge control visualizes the short-put distance covered by the athletes by using the image pointer.

samples.name: Range Customization
samples.description: This demo for Essential<sup>®</sup> JS2 Circular Gauge control shows various properties available to customize the ranges in the circular gauge.

samples.name: Multiple Ranges
samples.description: This demo for Essential<sup>®</sup> JS2 Circular Gauge control illustrates the multiple ranges in the circular gauge.

samples.name: Legend
samples.description: This demo for Essential<sup>®</sup> JS2 Circular Gauge control shows the properties required to customize the legend.

samples.name: Arc Gauge
samples.description: This demo for Essential<sup>®</sup> JS2 Circular Gauge control shows the properties required to customize the pointers.

samples.name: Semi-circular Gauge
samples.description: This demo for Essential<sup>®</sup> JS2 Circular Gauge control shows the properties required to customize the pointers.

samples.name: Pointer & Ranges Drag
samples.description: This demo for Essential<sup>®</sup> JS2 Circular Gauge control visualizes the pointer drag support and its options.

samples.name: Tooltip
samples.description: This demo for Essential<sup>®</sup> JS2 Circular Gauge control visualizes the tooltip for circular gauge pointer and ranges.

samples.name: Print & Export
samples.description: This demo for Essential<sup>®</sup> JS2 Circular Gauge control will print and export the circular gauge in a required format.

samples.name: Clock
samples.description: This demo for Essential<sup>®</sup> JS2 Circular Gauge control illustrates a clock by using annotation feature in the gauge.

samples.name: Radial Slider
samples.description: Thhis demo for Essential<sup>®</sup> JS2 Circular Gauge control to design the radial slider by using the circular gauge.

samples.description: This demo for Essential<sup>®</sup> JS2 Circular Gauge control illustrates how to make a direction compass by using the circular gauge.

samples.description: This demo for Essential<sup>®</sup> JS2 Circular Gauge control illustrates how to make a direction compass by using the circular gauge.

samples.name: Sleep Tracker
samples.description: This demo for Essential<sup>®</sup> JS2 Circular Gauge control to design sleep tracker by using circular gauge.

samples.name: Data Sample
samples.description: This demo for Essential<sup>®</sup> JS2 Circular Gauge control demonstrates live data, along with the data grid control.

samples.description: This demo for Essential<sup>®</sup> JS2 Circular Gauge control demonstrates live data, along with the apple watch rings.
